rcw

Function for creating chart configurations.

create_config creates configuration lists for use with

create_config(source = stop("'source' must be specified"), title = NULL,
  subtitle = NULL, type = stop("'type' must be specified"), path = NULL)

Arguments

source

SDMX URL
title

character string main title of chart
subtitle

character vector chart subtitle
type

one of BarChart, RowChart, ScatterChart, HSymbolChart, VSymbolChart, TimelineChart, StackedBarChart
path

path to a JSON template that can be read using jsonlite::fromJSON

Source

jsonlite was created by Jeroen Ooms et al., see https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/jsonlite/index.html.

Examples

## using system template
chartconfig <- create_config()
#> Error in create_config(): 'source' must be specified
str(chartconfig)
#> Error in str(chartconfig): object 'chartconfig' not found

## using custom template
jsonfile <- "../inst/templates/default.json"
chartconfig2 <- create_config(path = jsonfile)
#> Warning: cannot open file '../inst/templates/default.json': No such file or directory
#> Error in open.connection(con, "rb"): cannot open the connection
str(chartconfig2)
#> Error in str(chartconfig2): object 'chartconfig2' not found
